Anchorage.Anchorage 5th Avenue Mall: The Anchorage 5th Avenue Mall is an upscale regional shopping mall located in Downtown Anchorage, Alaska, United States. The mall has four levels with the only JCPenney and Nordstrom stores in Alaska as anchors. The mall also boasts Alaska's only Victoria's Secret, Apple Store, Coach, Banana Republic, Sephora, Teavana and Michael Kors locations.
